caption.p: (A) Particle sizes of nanoparticles after mixing, dialysis and freeze drying. A, B, C and D in the graph represents nanoparticles prepared with CAP Adp 0.33-RTV, CAP Adp 0.85-RTV, CA 320S Seb-RTV, CMCAB-RTV respectively; (B) Particle sizes of nanoparticles after mixing, dialysis and freeze drying. A, B, C and D in the graph represents nanoparticles prepared with CAP Adp 0.33-EFV, CAP Adp 0.85-EFV, CA 320S Seb-EFV, CMCAB-EFV respectively.
